official_title: Concurrent resolution that all citizens should reduce the temperatures of the home and place of work by 2 degrees during the approaching cold period in order to conserve energy.

summary.text: Expresses the sens of Congress that all citizens should reduce the temperatures of the home and place of work by two degrees during the approaching cold period in order to conserve energy.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution that all citizens should reduce the temperatures of the home and place of work by 2 degrees during the approaching cold period in order to conserve energy.
